content.title: Intro
content.content: -l is a Quenya suffix that has three meanings.

content.title: -l1
content.content: Used as an imperious or familiar form.[1] Longer form -lye.

content.title: -l(ye)2
content.content: Used as a singular pronoun suffix.[2]

content.title: -l3
content.content: Used as a suffix meaning you (courteous form). Longer form -lye.[3]
